1 REM *********************************
2 REM *                               *
3 REM * PROGRAMMA PER LA GENERAZIONE  *
4 REM *       DEL  FLASHTAPE          *
5 REM *                               *
6 REM * PRIMA DI CARICARLO IN MEMORIA *
7 REM * DIGITARE:                     *
8 REM *                               *
9 REM *   POKE44,16:POKE4096,0:NEW    *
10 REM*                               *
11 REM*********************************
12 REM
13 PRINT"(CLR)             ATTENDERE...."
15 RESTORE:IN=2049
20 READA$:IFA$="***"THEN70
30 TT=VAL(A$):POKEIN,TT
40 FORC=1TO7:READA:POKEIN+C,A:TT=TT+A:NEXT
50 READA:IFA<>(TT AND255)THENPRINT"ERRORE NEI   DATA ALLA LINEA"PEEK(64)*256+PEEK(63):END
60 IN=IN+8:GOTO20
70 HB=INT(IN/256):LB=IN-HB*256
80 PRINT "(CLR)P(SHIFT-O)43,1:P(SHIFT-O)44,8:P(SHIFT-O)45,"LB":P(SHIFT-O)46,"HB":CLR"
90 POKE631,19:POKE632,13:POKE198,2
100 END
